00028 class Exception:public std::exception {
00029 public:
00030 
00035    Exception( const MC2String& what, 
00036               const MC2String& nodeName ) throw():
00037       m_what( MC2String( "\"" ) + nodeName + "\" : " + what ),
00038       m_node( nodeName ) { 
00039    }
00040    ~Exception() throw() {
00041    }
00043    const MC2String& getNodeName() const { return m_node; }
00045    const char* what() const throw() { return m_what.c_str(); }
00046 
00047 private:
00048    MC2String m_what; //< exception description
00049    MC2String m_node; //< node name
00050 };

00076 inline DOMDocument* getOwner( DOMNode* node ) {
00077    if ( node->getNodeType() == DOMNode::DOCUMENT_NODE ||
00078         node->getNodeType() == DOMNode::DOCUMENT_TYPE_NODE ) {
00079       return static_cast<DOMDocument*>( node );
00080    }
00081    return node->getOwnerDocument();
00082 }
00083 
00090 inline DOMElement* addNode( DOMNode* root, const char* name ) {
00091    DOMElement* element = root->getOwnerDocument()->createElement( X( name ) );
00092    root->appendChild( element );
00093    return element;
00094 }

00104                                 bool caseCmp = true );

00113 template <typename T>
00114 DOMElement* addNode( DOMNode* root,
00115                      const char* name, const T& value ) {
00116    
00117    DOMElement* nameElement = addNode( root, name );
00118 
00119    setNodeValue( nameElement, value );
00120 
00121    return nameElement;
00122 }

00133 template <typename T>
00134 bool getAttribValue( T& attribValue, const char* attribName,
00135                      const DOMNode* node ) throw()
00136 try {
00137    const DOMNode* attribNode = findAttribConst( node, attribName );
00138 
00139    if ( attribNode == NULL ) {
00140       return false;
00141    }
00142 
00143    StringConvert::assign( attribValue, 
00144                           XMLUtility::transcodefrom( attribNode->
00145                                                      getNodeValue() ) );
00146 
00147    return true;
00148 
00149 } catch ( const StringConvert::ConvertException& e ) {
00150    return false;
00151 }
00152 
00160 template <typename T>
00161 void getAttrib( T& dest, const char* attribName, const DOMNode* node ) 
00162    throw ( Exception ) {
00163    MC2_ASSERT( attribName );
00164 
00165    const DOMNode* attribNode = findAttribConst( node, attribName );
00166    if ( attribNode == NULL ) {
00167       throw Exception("No such attribute", attribName );
00168    }
00169 
00170    try {
00171       StringConvert::assign<T>( dest, XMLUtility::
00172                                 transcodefrom( attribNode->getNodeValue() ) );
00173    } catch ( const StringConvert::ConvertException& e ) {
00174       throw Exception( e.what(), attribName );
00175    }
00176 }
00177 
00187 template <typename T>
00188 void getAttrib( T& dest, const char* attribName, const DOMNode* node,
00189                 const T& defaultValue ) throw() {
00190    try {
00191       getAttrib<T>( dest, attribName, node );
00192    } catch ( const Exception& e ) {
00193       dest = defaultValue;
00194    }
00195 }

00238 template <typename T>
00239 void getNodeValue( T& dest, const char* nodeName, const DOMNode* root ) 
00240    throw ( Exception ) {
00241    try {
00242       StringConvert::assign<T>( dest, getNodeValue( nodeName, root ) );
00243    } catch ( StringConvert::ConvertException& e ) {
00244       throw Exception(e.what(), nodeName );
00245    }

00299 
00311 template<typename T>
00312 T getNodeValue( const DOMNode* root, 
00313                 const T& defaultValue = T() ) 
00314 {
00315    using namespace StringConvert;
00316    try {
00317       DOMNode* child = root->getFirstChild();
00318       if ( child != NULL && child->getNodeType() == DOMNode::TEXT_NODE ) {
00319          return StringConvert::convert<T>( getTrimmedNodeValue( root ));
00320       }
00321    } catch ( const ConvertException& e ) {
00322    }
00323    return defaultValue;
00324 }
